rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0001
rows.name: Wow, is this the famous Saffronia tree?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0002
rows.name:
You don't see many trees with
red blossoms, do you? Wow,
it's absolutely gorgeous!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0003
rows.name: ...By the way...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0004
rows.name:
You've heard those legends about
confessing your love under a big tree
and having your wishes come true, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0005
rows.name:
I certainly hear those
kinds of stories often.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0006
rows.name:
Right? But don't you think
those are all lies?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0007
rows.name:
If feelings were granted that
easily in the first place,
everyone would be happy, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0008
rows.name: ...Have you tried it, Zakuro?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0009
rows.name:
Hey, never mind about me.
What about you, Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0010
rows.name:
You seem like the serious, committed
type, Kagutsuchi. Have you ever told
someone how you feel about them?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0011
rows.name: Me? Of course not.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0012
rows.name: How about you, Homura?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0013
rows.name: Eh? Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0014
rows.name:
Oh right, my bad. Homura already
has someone special, so this
doesn't apply to you...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0015
rows.name: Huh? What do you mean I "has someone"!?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0016
rows.name: I guess Saika... is spoken for as well.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0017
rows.name: Hmm, that might be true.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0018
rows.name:
Hana... you're probably still too
young for this sort of thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0019
rows.name: Hana has only just been born.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0020
rows.name:
You're right, these
conversations are better
saved for when you're older.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0021
rows.name: So what about you, Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0022
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0023
rows.name:
I thought we were here
to enjoy the view?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0024
rows.name: I'm going to confess my love right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0025
rows.name: How should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0026
rows.name: Weren't we here to enjoy the view?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0027
rows.name: I'm going to confess my love right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0028
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0029
rows.name:
Weren't we supposed to be
enjoying the scenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0030
rows.name: I shall confess my love right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0031
rows.name: What kind of response should I give?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0032
rows.name: Weren't we here to check out the view?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0033
rows.name:
I'm gonna tell ya how I
feel right here and now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0101
rows.name: Huh? The scenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, I've had enough of it.
One look was all I needed.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0103
rows.name:
...You were so enthusiastic
before, but now you don't
seem to care at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0104
rows.name:
Don't worry about it! I've got
it all saved in my memory.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0105
rows.name:
Anyway, doesn't some tasty
dessert sound good right now?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0106
rows.name:
Come on, Homura! Let's go get
some Fleur Bavarian cream!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0107
rows.name:
When in Invidia, you absolutely
HAVE to try it, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0108
rows.name:
If everyone else wants to,
I'm happy to go along...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0109
rows.name: ...So now you're hungry, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0110
rows.name: So you prefer food over beauty, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0111
rows.name: What are you saying, Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0112
rows.name:
Don't you get hungry after
seeing something beautiful?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0113
rows.name:
This is what they call the emotional
changes of a girl at that age!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0114
rows.name:
What "emotional changes"?
It's just your appetites
that are changing, Zakuro.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0115
rows.name:
What, you don't know? A cute girl's
desires know no bounds, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0116
rows.name:
That's one of a girl's
charms, right? Hana, make
sure you remember that!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0117
rows.name:
Girls are so complex... Hana
needs to learn more about this.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0201
rows.name: What?! Right now?!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0202
rows.name:
This is so embarrassing...
I'm getting all flustered...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0203
rows.name: Oh geez, I'm getting really tense now.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0204
rows.name:
No one said it would be
for Zakuro specifically.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0205
rows.name: True, it could be for me.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0206
rows.name: Indeed, it could very well be for me.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0207
rows.name:
Don't forget it might
be for me too, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0208
rows.name:
This is starting to look like
a competition, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0209
rows.name:
Come on, Driver! Tell us exactly
who you're confessing to!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0210
rows.name: N-No... I was just joking...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0211
rows.name: I-I was KIDDING! It was just a JOKE!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0212
rows.name:
My previous statement was
what they call a joke. Was
it hard to understand?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0213
rows.name:
'Course I was jokin'! Y'all
are too serious sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0214
rows.name: So it was a joke after all...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0215
rows.name: I took it seriously.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0216
rows.name:
Homura is so earnest. I thought
it seemed like a joke, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0217
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi's pulse rate
increased a little too.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0218
rows.name: Wh-what...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0219
rows.name:
Anyway, this isn't the place for
this kind of talk. Let's save it for
the girls' room back at the inn.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0220
rows.name:
We'll keep the Driver out, just
us girl Blades hanging out!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0221
rows.name:
We can bring our favorite
desserts and talk all night
long! It'll be so much fun!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0222
rows.name:
Hana will join in while charging
and learn many new things!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0223
rows.name:
I don't think we can
keep up with them...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0224
rows.name: That's right...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0225
rows.name:
I believe I'll let
Hikari-chan handle this...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0226
rows.name: This is going to be so much fun!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0227
rows.name:
Yeah yeah, don't worry!
We promise not to talk
behind the Driver's back!!
